kv15.9:1.3_0: Atthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa māraṇantiyo phasso, māraṇantiyā vedanā, māraṇantiyā saññā, māraṇantiyā cetanā, māraṇantiyaṁ cittanti?
kv15.9:1.5_0: natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa māraṇantiyo phasso, māraṇantiyā vedanā, māraṇantiyā saññā, māraṇantiyā cetanā, māraṇantiyaṁ cittanti?
kv15.9:1.7_0: Hañci natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa māraṇantiyo phasso, māraṇantiyā vedanā, māraṇantiyā saññā, māraṇantiyā cetanā, māraṇantiyaṁ cittaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv15.9:2.3_0: Atthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa phasso vedanā saññā cetanā cittanti?
kv15.9:2.5_0: natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa phasso vedanā saññā cetanā cittanti?
kv15.9:2.11_0: Hañci saphassakassa kālaṅkiriyā …pe… sacittakassa kālaṅkiriyā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv15.9:3.3_0: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa kāye visaṁ kameyya, satthaṁ kameyya, aggi kameyyāti?
kv15.9:3.5_0: saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa kāye visaṁ na kameyya, satthaṁ na kameyya, aggi na kameyyāti?
kv15.9:3.7_0: Hañci saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa kāye visaṁ na kameyya, satthaṁ na kameyya, aggi na kameyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv15.9:4.3_0: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa kāye visaṁ kameyya, satthaṁ kameyya, aggi kameyyāti?
kv15.9:5.3_0: Atthi so niyāmo yena niyāmena niyato saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpanno na kālaṁ kareyyāti?
kv15.9:5.5_0: Hañci natthi so niyāmo yena niyāmena niyato saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpanno na kālaṁ kareyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv15.9:6.3_0: Atthi so niyāmo yena niyāmena niyato cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgī na kālaṁ kareyyāti?
kv15.9:6.5_0: Hañci natthi so niyāmo yena niyāmena niyato cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgī na kālaṁ kareyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
